SEARCH
Package com.example.webshop.db

Class UserDB

java.lang.Object
com.example.webshop.bo.User
com.example.webshop.db.UserDB
public class UserDB extends User
Represents a user in the webshop database, extends the User class. Provides a static method for searching a user by their username in the database.

    • searchUser

      public static UserDB searchUser(String userName)
      Searches for a user in the database by username.
      Parameters:
      userName - The username to search for.
      Returns:
      A UserDB object if the user exists, otherwise null.
